actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage. If the magmin is ablaze and the target is a creature  it suffers 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage until a creature takes an action to extinguish the flame on the target.

actions.name: Spurt Magma (Ablaze Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage.

special_abilities.name: Blazing Blood
special_abilities.desc: When the magmin takes damage that doesnt kill it, or when it is subjected to fire damage, its magma shell cracks and it is set ablaze. While ablaze, the magmin sheds bright light for 10 feet and dim light for an additional 10 feet. If the magmin is subjected to cold damage while ablaze, this flame is extinguished. The magmin can also set itself ablaze or extinguish itself as an action.

special_abilities.name: Death Burst
special_abilities.desc: If the magmin dies while ablaze, it explodes in a burst of magma. Each creature within 10 feet makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save. Unattended flammable objects in the area are ignited.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: A magmin doesnt require air, sustenance, or sleep.
